content:
Seenaayu girinin savidhe virapoondu
Naathhaa! Deveshaa!
Girivaaridhidharanaam ninne
Kanyakayaam mariyaamenti
Vezhchapedaathavall garbhiniyaayu
Vachanaatheetham prasavichu
Thalsmrthiye vishruthamaakkaname.

Unnatharaajyamathum-shaashvatha jeevithavum
Nirmmalaraarjikkum
Satthama mashihaabhakthanmaa-
Rarhikkunna mahaabhaagyam
Jadanethram darshikkukayo-
Shravanam kellkkukayo hrdayam
Therukayo cheythittillethum

Mishihaayude rushmaa-maamodeesaayaal
Sampraapichoraayu
Thrppaavanuthanu bhakshichu
Punyaninam paanam cheythor
Poozhiyil ninnum thaanmoolam
Praananodereedhoollikuda-
Nyathithejo-vasthram chaarttheedum.

Jananee parishuddhaa-praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.

Nin sharane mrtharaam thaathasahodararil
Choriyaname moda-ppanineeren naathhaa!

Susmrthi jananikkum-vishruthi siddharkkum
Jeevan vigatharkkum-cherppone sthothram.

Jananee parishuddha-praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.
